long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ú® Grammarlyier+ Auto-Correct Extension üìù‚ú®

Grammarlyier is an unofficial auto-correct tool meant for Grammarly Auto-Correct Extension and dark mode tool designed to enhance your writing experience on Grammarly! üöÄ

# Update Log:
 - Fixed all the issues with click and speed issues.
 - Added custom button to page
 - Will be adding more items soon.

# Features
- Auto-Correction: Seamlessly correct your grammar, punctuation, and spelling mistakes as you type.
- Dark Mode: Protect your eyes and enjoy a comfortable writing environment with the dark mode feature.
- Compatibility: Works seamlessly with Grammarly and other writing tools to ensure smooth integration.
- User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface for effortless usage.
- Enhanced Productivity: Focus on your writing without worrying about errors or distractions.

# How to Use
1. Install Grammarlyier: Simply download and install the Grammarlyier browser extension.
2. Activate Auto-Correction: Start typing, and Grammarlyier will automatically correct your mistakes in real-time.
3. Enable Dark Mode: Toggle the dark mode feature for a visually pleasing writing experience.

# Support
If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, feel free to reach out to us through contact button below.

# Disclaimer
Grammarlyier is an unofficial tool and is not affiliated with Grammarly. Use it at your own discretion.

# License
